name: Kasey Gonnella
text: I ordered online and had it delivered, it arrived in 40 min instead of the quoted hour which was awesome. The toppings were decent, lots of hard core pineapple chunks but the bacon was perfect. The crust seemed different than usual and I could not tell the difference between the two crust options I chose.

name: Chadilac
text: This place is awesome!  The breadsticks are delicious.  The pizza roll is great and the pizza is awesome!  The delivery was very fast and on time.  Thanks for all that you do!

name: Jon Dugger
text: Heard it was good pizza. So I went online to order 75$ worth of pizza for a group. Spent 10 min plugging away after I downloaded the app. Then app says 90 min wait. Then there was no way to check out. It says call for deliveries. So. ‚Ä¶More

name: Phil Spencer
text: The pizza and wings tasted fine, but they overcharged me by a few dollars.

name: Laura Schafer
text: I used to live out west and I haven't seen a Hungry Howie's in nearly a decade. We happened across one on vacation and I dragged my husband and kids in because they "had to try it!" I ordered all the best pizzas with my favorite flavored ‚Ä¶More

name: Caleb Olson
text: Experience was sub-par. Want to give some benefit of the doubt given the difficulties that COVID is creating but our experience was clunky with some basic issues. After a long day at the beach, we thought we‚Äôd do something quick and easy ‚Ä¶More

name: K T
text: Customer service not good at all today. Only one person working. She was rude. Didn‚Äôt say anything when we said ‚Äúthank you‚Äù 3 times. Gave her a tip, hopefully she has a better day. Yikes

name: Myra Johnson
text: Pizza not hot.  Ordered on line. Had enough time to ensure temperature. Prepared before time. Lied about time. 2 pm. Won't order on line. Don't unless you want cold.

name: Joe Hamilton
text:

text: They made one mean salid a Very tasty one... The staff where very nice,and clean I/we would go back!!!

name: Strawberry Shortcake
text: Driver is very nice make sure to tip them it is very hard work! Pizza was on poiinnt as always i love this joint! It was delivered less than an hour best spot for pizza.

name: Gwynneth Smith
text:
Delivery guy was great as well as the person we ordered with on the phone.
One of the orders was wrong we got pepperoni instead of sausage. This pizza, isvery bland IMO. On par with the flavor of Little Caesars.  I am a pizza fan and this just didnt hit the spot for me.

name: Josh Reed
text: Pizza was great and the employees were friendly!

name: Chad Micah Brown 13
text: Hungry Now he's is always so good!  I miss them so much from when they used to be in Centerville.

name: Xee
text: All the pizzas were correct and yummy. The turnover time was about 30 minutes, just enough time to pick up the cake in between time to pick up. Convenience at its bestü§ó

text: Tried to order for delivery the guy answering phone said they closed at 10 but yet they're still answering the phone. I tried to tell him online its says they close at 11 and he rudely hangs up.

text: It's good pizza & breadsticks. Hand tossed to your liking.

text: This was a unique pizza for us in that the crust is flavored.  Mine was garlic butter and it was very good!

name: Alicia Freeman
text: Very clean place to eat. The service was great and the food was equally as great. The prices are very reasonable as well. I definitely reccomend this place.

name: MissYummyLollipops
text: Really yummy pizza, service is great! Will reccomend this joint for anyday of the week.

name: Lauryn Watkins
text: I‚Äôm originally from Indiana. I come to Destin every year for vacation and always go to Hungry Howie‚Äôs! Great spaghetti and nice workers! Definitely recommend eating here.

name: Supreme Gauntlet
text: Pizza was awesome! But the center piece is really the different flavors of crust! I only gave it a four because the tables at my location weren't wiped, however it only took them fifteen minutes to prepare two pizzas and a cookie. I'd recommend it if anyone ever in the Florida Emerald Coast area.

name: Noah Scott
text: Very well run location very friendly staff. Lucky to have hard-working employees and I am picky. Will be back

name: YESHUA 777
text: Great pizza place!!  Pizza was great and sauce was tasty but not sweet like other places.   Will come back again.

name: Mcfly88
text: great food, great service.  I order from home and work.  Don't pay attention to the negative reviews about delivery times; I know how busy it gets and then there's traffic...

name: J legoman890
text: it's a very clean place. not much seating but still a great place. pizza is amazing like always. fills you up depending how much pizza you order. Prices are not expensive but not that cheap. it's in between which is great cause you pay for what you get. Service is amazing and fast and friendly no matter what time you go. Overall 5/5

name: Bobbi Lopez
text: Excellent food.  Excellent service, friendly staff.  However, women's bathroom did not have a working hand dryer nor towels to dry hands with.  Was advised to use the napkin dispenser on wall above trashcan outside of the bathroom.  üëÄ

name: Nikki Teague
text: Great value for the money and very good pizza!

text:
This is my go to location.
Restaurant is always clean and tidy.
Excellent service and I have always received exactly what I ordered. ‚Ä¶More

text: Do yourself a favor and get yourself a frozen pizza. It will taste better and it will be much cheaper. The delivery time was super slow during the middle of the week (hour wait). Instant regret of our pizza selection while on vacation.

name: Dodge Shepard
text: The food was okay, but the staff was a little rude.

name: Jeff Towell
text: Very good low priced pizza.  If you want a good selection of pizza, salad, and subs, you have got to try Hungry Howie‚Äôs.  Haven‚Äôt had anything we did not like.  If you have never had it, give it a try when you want good, low priced pizza.

text: Their flavored crusts and breads sticks are excellent. The staff was very friendly. Dining in isn't anything special, but they did change the channel on the tv so we could watch the game.

text: Always fast and the food is always great. Order online and you can customize your food exactly how you want it; well done, light sauce, extra crust seasoning... anything, and they make it perfect.

name: Emily Banks
text: Might as well get pizza hut for the same quality and a cheaper price.

name: Jillian Hawkins
text: Great little pizza joint!! Vegan friendly! I got the small oven baked sub (calzone) I got it with no cheese, no parm, and no butter. I ordered lettuce, tomatoes, and peppers on the side (no charge). It was very tasty and I would definitely order again. By the way the sub sauce that comes with is also vegan and delicious!

text: Their flat crust pizza is not great. Their standard flavored crust Cajun seasoning is quite good. Their "chicken tenders" are glorified chicken nuggets.

text: I like Howies but the food is inconsistant.

name: jaimie smith
text: I go here all the time their pizza is definitely the best around and I always have the best customer service each time the two gentleman are very nice! I recommend butter cheese and garlic for the crust!

name: Thor Neff
text: Ordered 3 pizzas from here on a Saturday night during the busy season. Was told it would be 45 mins. Had them in hand and correct in 25 mins. Can't beat the price and they were fast even though they were crazy busy.
